src/asset-loaders/PackAsset.js
PackAsset
description:
Pack asset loader.
It serves also as fetch engine (it's subassets container).

name: hasEntry
description: Tells if pack has subasset of given path.

return.description: True if entry exists, false otherwise.

name: entryView
description: Gets Array buffer view of given subasset.

params.name: noThrow
params.description: Tells if function should not throw exceptions on fail.

return.description: Subasset array view if exists or null otherwise.

name: entryText
description: Gets text representation of given subasset.

params.name: noThrow
params.description: Tells if function should not throw exceptions on fail.

src/components/AtlasSprite.js
AtlasSprite
examples:
const component = new AtlasSprite();
component.deserialize({ shader: 'shader://sprite.json', atlas: 'atlas://sheet.json:box.png' });

name: src/components/Camera.js
onView
description: Called when camera need to view rendered scene.

return.description: True if ignore viewing entity children, false otherwise.

name: src/components/Camera2D.js
Camera2D
examples:
const component = new Camera2D();
component.deserialize({ zoomOut: 1024, zoomMode: 'keep-aspect' });

name: src/components/CameraDirector2D.js
CameraDirector2D
description: Control multiple 2D cameras with one director.
examples:
const component = new CameraDirector2D();
component.deserialize({ zoomOut: 1024, zoomMode: 'keep-aspect', cameras: [ './cameraA', './cameraB' ] });

name: onView
description: Called when camera need to view rendered scene.

return.description: True if ignore viewing entity children, false otherwise.

name: src/components/index.js
src/components/InputHandler.js
InputHandler
examples:
const component = new InputHandler();
component.deserialize({ requireGamepad: true });

name: clear
description: Clear all axes, triggers and configs.

name: setup
examples: component.setup({ axes: { 'pos-x': { mouse: 'left' } }, triggers: { action: { key: 32 } } });

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold, return value, zero otherwise).

name: getAxisDelta
description: Get delta value of given axis.

name: setAxis
examples:
// reset axis to prevent further usage in this frame.
component.setAxis('pos-x', 0);

name: isAxisHold
description: Tells if axis is currently hold.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold, return true, false otherwise).

name: isAxisPressed
description: Tells if axis is pressed in current frame.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold and axis was not hold in previous frame, return true, false otherwise).

name: isAxisReleased
description: Tells if axis is released in current frame.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is smaller than treshold and axis was hold in previous frame, return true, false otherwise).

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold, return value, zero otherwise).

name: getTriggerDelta
description: Get delta value of given trigger.

name: setTrigger
examples:
// reset trigger to prevent further usage in this frame.
component.setTrigger('pos-x', 0);

name: isTriggerHold
description: Tells if trigger is currently hold.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold, return true, false otherwise).

name: isTriggerPressed
description: Tells if trigger is pressed in current frame.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is greater than treshold and trigger was not hold in previous frame, return true, false otherwise).

name: isTriggerReleased
description: Tells if trigger is released in current frame.

params.name: treshold
params.description: Value treshold (if value is smaller than treshold and trigger was hold in previous frame, return true, false otherwise).

name: acquireGamepad
description: Asynchronously acquire gamepad (specify trigger to press and waiting duration).

name: setAcquiredGamepad
description: Manually acquire gamepad by it's index.

name: src/components/InputListener.js
InputListener
description: Entity listener for mouse input (good for buttons logic).
examples:
const component = new InputListener();
component.deserialize({ width: 100, height: 50, xOffset: 50, yOfffset: 25, camera: '/ui' });

name: src/components/Particles.js
Particles
examples:
const component = new Particles();
component.deserialize({ shader: 'shaders/particles.json', processor: 'particles/fire.ps' });

name: registerProcessor
emitBurst
description: Emit burst of particles using burst generator function.

name: src/components/PhysicsBody.js

types: {...undefined: Object, "applyPositionTo": string, "applyRotationTo": string, "applyPositionFrom": string, "applyRotationFrom": string, "bodyType": string, "radius": string, "vertices": string, "shapeType": string, "density": string, "friction": string, "restitution": string, "linearVelocity": string, "angularVelocity": string, "linearDamping": string, "angularDamping": string, "fixedRotation": string, "bullet": string, "sensor": string, "coordsScale": string, "listenForContacts": string}

name: src/components/PhysicsWorld.js
src/components/PrefabInstance.js
src/components/RectangleRenderer.js

types: {"visible": *, "shader": *, "overrideUniforms": *, "overrideSamplers": *, "layers": *, "width": string, "height": string, "xOffset": string, "yOffset": string, "xOrigin": string, "yOrigin": string, "color": string}

name: src/components/Script.js

types: {"NONE": *, "MOUSE_DOWN": *, "MOUSE_UP": *, "MOUSE_MOVE": *, "MOUSE": number, "KEY_DOWN": *, "KEY_UP": *, "KEY": number, "GAMEPAD_CONNECTED": *, "GAMEPAD_DISCONNECTED": *, "GAMEPAD_PROCESS": *, "GAMEPAD": number, "LEAP_CONNECTED": *, "LEAP_DISCONNECTED": *, "LEAP_PROCESS": *, "LEAP": number, "INPUT": number, "CONTACT_BEGIN": *, "CONTACT_END": *, "CONTACT": number, "ALL": number}

name: src/components/Skeleton.js

types: {...undefined: Object, "asset": string, "skin": string, "animation": string, "loop": string, "speed": string, "time": string, "paused": string}

name: src/components/SortedActions.js
src/components/Sprite.js

types: {"visible": *, "shader": *, "overrideUniforms": *, "overrideSamplers": *, "layers": *, "text": string, "font": string, "color": string, "colorOutline": string, "halign": string, "valign": string, "filtering": string}

name: src/components/UiLayout.js
src/components/UiSprite.js

types: {"visible": *, "shader": *, "overrideUniforms": *, "overrideSamplers": *, "layers": *, "overrideBaseTexture": string, "overrideBaseFiltering": string, "camera": string, "width": string, "height": string, "widthAnchor": string, "heightAnchor": string, "xOrigin": string, "yOrigin": string, "topOffset": string, "bottomOffset": string, "leftOffset": string, "rightOffset": string, "topBorder": string, "bottomBorder": string, "leftBorder": string, "rightBorder": string, "atlas": string, "color": string}

name: src/components/VerticesRenderer.js

name: src/index.js
lazyInitialization
description: Function used to initialize Oxygen Core engine without any effort.

name: src/systems/AssetSystem/Asset.js
Asset
description: Asset - base of any asset loader.

name: fetchSubAsset
description: Use this asset as fetch engine and load part of it's content as asset.

name: onReady
description: Called when asset is loaded and ready to use.

name: src/systems/AssetSystem/index.js
AssetSystem
examples: const system = new AssetSystem('assets/', { cached: true }, AssetSystem.fetchArrayView);

name: fetchArrayView
description: Custom fetch mechanism that loads data from array view.

return.description: Promise that fetches file from array view.

params.name: pathPrefix
params.description: Path prefix used for every requested asset or null no path prefix.

params.name: fetchOptions
params.description: Custom fetch options or null if default will be used.

params.name: fetchEngine
params.description: Custom fetch engine or null if default will be used.

name: dispose
description: Destructor (dispose internal resources and clear assets database).

name: registerProtocol
description: Register assets loader under given protocol.

name: get
description: Get asset by it's full path.

return.description: Asset instance if found or null otherwise.

name: loadSequence
description: Load list of assets in sequence (one by one).

name: loadAll
description: Load list of assets possibly all at the same time (asynchronously).

name: unload
description: Unload asset by path and remove from database.

name: unloadAll
description: Unload all assets from paths list.

name: src/systems/AudioSystem.js
getWaver
description: Gets given waver by it's id.

name: hasSound
description: Tells if there is registered given sound.

return.description: True if sound exists, false otherwise.
Sound audio buffer source node if found or null if not.

params.name: autoDestination
params.description: Tells if sound should be automaticaly bound with context destination.

name: whenSoundIsReady
description: Produces promise that resolves when sound is decoded into memory (decoding is done asynchronously).

name: hasMusic
description: Tells if given music is registered.

return.description: True if music exists, false otherwise.
Music instance if found, null otherwise.

name: playMusic
description:
Play given music.
Mostly you will be able to play only one music at the same time.

name: src/systems/EntitySystem/Component.js
Component
description: Component - entity way to express it's behaviour.

name: dispose
description: Destructor (dispose internal resources and detach from entity).

name: deserialize
description: Deserialize JSON properties into this component.

name: onAlterActionArguments
description: Called when asked to alter arrived action parameters.

return.description: New action parameters or undefined if they're not change.

name: onPropertySetup
description: Called when given property is deserialized.

name: src/systems/EntitySystem/Entity.js
Entity
description: Entity - actor of the scene, container for behaviour components.

name: activate
description: Make this entity and it's children active.

name: deactivate
description: Make this entity and it's children inactive.

name: serialize
description: Serialize this entity into JSON data.

name: deserialize
description: Deserialize JSON data into this entity.

name: setRotation
description: Set entity local Z axis rotation.

name: setRotationEuler
description: Set entity local rotation from euler degrees.

name: getRotation
description: Get entity local Z axis radian rotation.

name: getRotationEuler
description: Get entity local euler axis rotation in degrees.

name: getChild
description: Get entity children at given index.

name: killChildren
description: Kills all entity children (calls dispose on them and removes them from entity).

params.name: entity
params.description: New parent entity or null if not bound to any entity.

params.name: insertAt
params.description: Child index at given should be placed this entity in new parent

name: findEntity
description: Find entity by it's name or path in scene tree.

return.description: Found entity instance or null if not found.

name: attachComponent
examples:
entity.attachComponent('MyComponent', new MyComponent());
entity.attachComponent('Hello', new Hello());

name: detachComponent
description: Detach component by it's type name.

name: getComponent
description: Find component by it's type name.

return.description: Component instance if found or null otherwise.

name: performAction
performActionOnComponents
description:
Perform action only on components (do not pass action further to children).
See: {@link performAction}

name: performOnComponents
description: Perform custom callback action on entity components of given type and it's children.

params.name: id
params.description: Affected component type (can be null if want to call every component).

params.name: action
params.description: Custom action callback. Callback gets one argument with component instance.

name: performOnChildren
description: Perform custom callback action only on entity and optionally it's children.

params.name: action
params.description: Custom action callback. Callback gets one argument with child instance.

params.name: deep
params.description: True if should be called on it's children.

name: updateTransforms
description: Update entity ant it's children transforms.

params.name: forced
params.description: If true ignore optimizations and update anyway.

name: sortChildren
description: Sort children by entity childrenSorting function if set.

name: src/systems/EntitySystem/index.js
EntitySystem

params.name: triggerEvents
params.description: Tells if system should trigger events.

name: registerComponent
examples:
class MyComponent extends Component { static factory() { return new MyComponent(); } }
system.registerComponent('MyComponent', MyComponent.factory);

params.name: componentConstructor
params.description: Component factory function (it should return new instance of component).

name: createComponent
description: Create component instnace by it's type name and apply properties to it.

params.name: properties
params.description: Object with key-value pairs of component properties.

name: buildEntity

params.name: data
params.description: JSON representation of serialized entity data.

name: performAction
description:
Perform action on root entity.
Actions are events that are performed by entity components and are passed down to it's children.

name: src/systems/index.js
src/systems/InputSystem.js
InputSystem
description: User input (mouse, keyboard, gamepad, leap motion).

params.name: canvas
params.description: Canvas element to listen for events from.

params.name: triggerEvents
params.description: Tells if system should trigger events.

name: scanForGamepads
description: Scan for changes in browser gamepads list.

name: src/systems/RenderSystem.js
constructor
description:
Constructor.
Automaticaly binds into specified canvas.

name: extension
description: Get WebGL extension by it's name.

return.description: WebGL extension or null if not found.

name: registerShader
enableShader
description: Enable given shader (make it currently active for further rendering).

params.name: forced
params.description: ignore optimizations (by default it will not enable if is currently active).

name: disableShader
description:
Disable given shader.
Make sure that this is currently active shader (otherwise it will unbind wrong shader locations)!

name: overrideShaderUniform
description: Give active shader uniform a different than it's default value.

params.name: value
params.description: Uniform value. Can be number of array of numbers.

name: overrideShaderSampler
description: Give active shader sampler different than it's default texture.

params.name: filtering
params.description: Sampler filtering. Can be linear or nearest.

name: registerTexture
registerTextureEmpty
description: Register empty texture (mostly usedin  offscreen rendering cases).

params.name: floatPointData
params.description: Tells if this texture will store floating point data.

name: getTextureMeta
description: Get texture meta information (width and height).

return.description: Object with width and height properties or null if not found.

params.name: floatPointData
params.description: Tells if render target will store floating point data.

name: getRenderTargetMeta
description: Get render target meta information (width and height).

return.description: Object with width and height properties or null if not found.

name: enableRenderTarget
description: Make given render target active for further rendering.

name: hasShader
description: Tells if there is registered given shader.

name: hasTexture
description: Tells if there is registered given texture.

name: hasRenderTarget
description: Tells if there is registered given render target.

name: resize
description: Resize frame buffer to match canvas size.

name: src/systems/StorageSystem.js
StorageSystem
loadSession
description: Load browser session storage data into memory.

name: saveSession
description: Save memory session storage into browser.

name: load
description: Load browser permanent storage data into memory.

name: save
description: Save memory permanent storage into browser.

name: src/systems/System.js
System
description:
System base class.
Every Oxygen Core system extends this class.

name: register
description: Register new system instance under given name.

name: get
description: Returns system instance of given type name.

return.description: System instance if registered or null if not.

name: dispose
description: Dispose and remove all registered systems.

name: onRegister
description: Event called after system gets registered.

name: onUnregister
description: Event called before system gets unregistered.

name: src/utils/box2d.js
src/utils/Events.js
Events

params.name: callback
params.description: Event callback. Arguments are passed here from trigger methods.

name: off
description:
Remove given callback from listeners of given event.
If callback is omitted, then all callbacks of given event are removed.

name: trigger
description: Triggers given event with given callback parameters.

name: triggerLater
description: Triggers given event with given callback parameters on next execution frame (delayed).

name: src/utils/index.js
findMapKeyOfValue
description: Search for key of given map value.

return.description: value key or null if value not found.

name: waitForSeconds
description: Produces promise that waits given amount of seconds, then resolves itself.

name: stringToRGBA
description: Converts hexadecimal color string into four element array of color channels values.

return.description: Four element array of color channels.

name: propsEnumStringify
description: Stringify key-value map into enumeration-like representation.

name: convertGlobalPointToLocalPoint
description: Converts global vec2 coordinate into local vec2 coordinate.

name: convertLocalPointToGlobalPoint
description: Converts local vec2 coordinate into global vec2 coordinate.

name: isGlobalPointInGlobalBoundingBox
description: Tells if given global vec2 coordinate is contained by given bounding box in given global transform space.

return.description: True if point is contained by bounding box.

name: isLocalPointInLocalBoundingBox
description: Tells if given local vec2 coordinate is contained by given bounding box.

return.description: True if point is contained by bounding box.

name: bezierCubic
description: Calculate cubic bezier curve value at given time with four curve parameters.

name: src/utils/particleSystemParser.js

content:
# Oxygen Core
## Professional HTML5 game engine - One of the best Xenon Core engines family.

![Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/PsichiX/Oxygen.svg?branch=master)
![ESDoc Coverage](./docs/badge.svg)

## Table of contents
1. [Installation](#installation)
1. [Simple project generator](#simple-project-generator)
1. [Imagination is your ONLY limit](#imagination-is-your-only-limit)

## Installation
```bash
npm install oxygen-core
```

## Simple project generator
To automatically generate base project structure and install dependencies, install:
https://www.npmjs.com/package/oxygen-project-generator

Then:
```bash
cd path/to/your/project
oxy-gen project-name
```

## Imagination is your ONLY limit
Check **[Operation: SoulHunter](http://soulhunter.psichix.io)** game to see what you can do.

**Imagine more, don't limit yourself - make your HTML5 dream come true!**
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "oxygen-core",
  "version": "1.2.33",
  "description": "Oxygen game engine (Xenon Core for browsers)",
  "main": "bin/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rm -rf bin bin-tools docs",
    "build": "./node_modules/.bin/babel src -d bin",
    "build-tools": "./node_modules/.bin/babel tools -d bin-tools",
    "browserify": "./node_modules/.bin/browserify bin/index.js -o bin/oxygen-core.js -s Oxygen",
    "browserify-uglify": "./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -nm -o bin/oxygen-core.min.js bin/oxygen-core.js",
    "browserify-min": "npm run browserify && npm run browserify-uglify",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "make": "npm run build && npm run build-tools && npm run browserify-min && npm run docs",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run make",
    "postinstall": "npm run make",
    "oxygen-pack": "node ./bin-tools/pack-cli.js"
  },
  "bin": {
    "oxy-pack": "./cli/pack.js",
    "oxy-spine": "./cli/spine.js"
  },
  "files": [
    "cli/",
    "parsers/",
    "src/",
    "tools/",
    "docs/",
    ".babelrc",
    "esdoc.json",
    "bin/oxygen-core.js",
    "bin/oxygen-core.min.js"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/PsichiX/Oxygen.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "webgl",
    "browser",
    "game",
    "engine",
    "es7"
  ],
  "author": "Patryk 'PsichiX' Budzynski <psichix@gmail.com> (http://psichix.io)",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/PsichiX/Oxygen/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/PsichiX/Oxygen#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "latest",
    "babel-plugin-conditional-compile": "latest",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "latest",
    "babel-polyfill": "latest",
    "babel-preset-env": "latest",
    "babel-preset-minify": "latest",
    "bezier-easing": "latest",
    "box2dweb-commonjs": "latest",
    "browserify": "latest",
    "esdoc": "latest",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "latest",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "latest",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "latest",
    "leapjs": "latest",
    "stream-buffers": "latest",
    "uglify-js": "latest",
    "waver-js": "latest"
  }
}
name: package.json
